cart_to_cyl¶

clustertools.util.coordinates.cart_to_cyl(x, y, z, vx, vy, vz)[source]¶

NAME:

cart_to_cyl

PURPOSE:

Convert cylindrical to spherical coordinates

INPUT:

x,y,z,vx,vy,vz

OUTPUT:

r,theta,z,vr,vtheta,vz

HISTORY:

2018 - Written - Webb (UofT)
